channel.title: Weapon problem
channel.description:
Hi,
Yeah so when I wield like an AGS and then I wield a rapier, the name doesn't change to Rapier it still says AGS. The source is BruteScape. Can someone please help me?
Thanks in advance.
-I R J4K3

item.title: Weapon problem
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No clue what BruteScape is, what revision is it?

Chances are it’s not sending the attack tab information – is the interface changing properly (like slash/crush buttons showing instead of stab)

Read full topic

Yeah so like what you need to do bro is send the info from the server to the client to change the item name yeah?
